about_the_game: The soundtrack to Escape From Inferno was made by the same person who developed the game itself, TheBlueAidan. It features twelve songs provided in MP3, FLAC, and MIDI format. It also has an instrument list in the form of a TXT file that gives the names of all the instruments used from the synth the developer utilized.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 88 MB available space

  • Additional Notes: The MIDI files and instrument list will take up an additional 406 KB of space.

short_description: This is the soundtrack to the Escape From Inferno indie game, composed by TheBlueAidan. Aidan also developed the game itself. It features twelve songs (a title theme, ten stage themes, and a credits theme).
